About

user: outlace

Hi. I'm a self-taught programmer, current medical student and also involved in web-development side projects. I don't get to do any interesting programming stuff in my 'day job', so I try to build little hobby projects in my free time. I'm particularly interested in machine learning, computational biology, statistics/data analysis, and mathematics but I don't have any formal quantitative background, so I'm attempting to teach myself the basics and will share my journey on this blog.
